A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi failed to give you the \"Star Wars movie\" feel. Very much gimmicky\, parody\, and corny lines made me look around the theater to make sure I was still watching a Star Wars movie. Not a fan with the script\, and character development is starting to take a turn to the pits. I would instead invest in episodes 1-6\, for any more \"Star Wars\" movies will not deliver as long as Disney owns the rights to Lucas Films.
